name: niivue-desktop
description: An Electron application with React and TypeScript
author: example.com

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.dev: npm run ensure-niimath && npm run ensure-dcm2niix && electron-vite dev
scripts.build: npm run build:deps && npm run typecheck && electron-vite build
scripts.fetch-niimath:win: mkdir -p native-binaries/win32 && LATEST=$(npm run --silent niimath:latest-tag) && curl -sL https://github.com/rordenlab/niimath/releases/latest/download/niimath_win.zip -o native-binaries/niimath-win.zip && unzip -j native-binaries/niimath-win.zip -d native-binaries/win32 && rm native-binaries/niimath-win.zip
scripts.fetch-niimath:mac: mkdir -p native-binaries/darwin && LATEST=$(npm run --silent niimath:latest-tag) && curl -sL https://github.com/rordenlab/niimath/releases/latest/download/niimath_macos.zip -o native-binaries/niimath-mac.zip && unzip -j native-binaries/niimath-mac.zip -d native-binaries/darwin && rm native-binaries/niimath-mac.zip
scripts.fetch-niimath:linux: mkdir -p native-binaries/linux && LATEST=$(npm run --silent niimath:latest-tag) && curl -sL https://github.com/rordenlab/niimath/releases/latest/download/niimath_lnx.zip -o native-binaries/niimath-linux.zip && unzip -j native-binaries/niimath-linux.zip -d native-binaries/linux && rm native-binaries/niimath-linux.zip
scripts.fetch-dcm2niix:win: mkdir -p native-binaries/win32 && LATEST=$(npm run --silent dcm2niix:latest-tag) && curl -sL https://github.com/rordenlab/dcm2niix/releases/latest/download/dcm2niix_win.zip -o native-binaries/dcm2niix-win.zip && unzip -j native-binaries/dcm2niix-win.zip -d native-binaries/win32 && rm native-binaries/dcm2niix-win.zip
scripts.fetch-dcm2niix:mac: mkdir -p native-binaries/darwin && LATEST=$(npm run --silent dcm2niix:latest-tag) && curl -sL https://github.com/rordenlab/dcm2niix/releases/latest/download/dcm2niix_macos.zip -o native-binaries/dcm2niix-mac.zip && unzip -j native-binaries/dcm2niix-mac.zip -d native-binaries/darwin && rm native-binaries/dcm2niix-mac.zip
scripts.fetch-dcm2niix:linux: mkdir -p native-binaries/linux && LATEST=$(npm run --silent dcm2niix:latest-tag) && curl -sL https://github.com/rordenlab/dcm2niix/releases/latest/download/dcm2niix_lnx.zip -o native-binaries/dcm2niix-linux.zip && unzip -j native-binaries/dcm2niix-linux.zip -d native-binaries/linux && rm native-binaries/dcm2niix-linux.zip
scripts.build-release:win: npm run ensure-niimath && npm run ensure-dcm2niix && npm run build:win
scripts.build-release:mac: npm run ensure-niimath && npm run ensure-dcm2niix && npm run build:mac
scripts.build-release:linux: npm run ensure-niimath && npm run ensure-dcm2niix && npm run build:linux
